concept.title: Hotkey Settings
concept.shortdesc: Overall, most settings will be fairly self-explanatory.

conbody.p: Here you can set hotkeys that do a variety of things. Some examples:

ul.li: Capture active window for Game Capture

conbody.p: Keyboard keys are supported. To use joysticks as hotkeys on Linux and Windows, you can use antimicro to map the joystick keys to common keyboard keys and then use them in OBS.
